mapper.insert: INSERT INTO permission_user(name, password, email, contact, description, department_code) VALUES (#{name},#{password},#{email},#{contact},#{description}, (select code from basicinfo_department where name = #{department}))
mapper.update: update permission_user pu inner join (select code,name from basicinfo_department)bd on bd.name = #{department} set pu.name = #{name}, pu.password = #{password}, pu.email = #{email}, pu.contact = #{contact}, pu.description = #{description}, pu.department_code = bd.code where pu.name = #{name}
mapper.select: select pu.name, pu.password, pu.email, pu.contact, pu.description, bd.name as department from permission_user pu left join basicinfo_department bd on pu.department_code = bd.code
